description: Provides details about how an DataSync transfer location for an object storage system is configured.

parameters.name: LocationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the object storage system location.

nested_items.name: LocationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the object storage system location.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URI of the object storage system location.

nested_items.name: AccessKey
nested_items.description: The access key (for example, a user name) required to authenticate with the object storage system.

nested_items.name: ServerPort
nested_items.description: The port that your object storage server accepts inbound network traffic on (for example, port 443).

nested_items.name: ServerProtocol
nested_items.description: The protocol that your object storage system uses to communicate.

nested_items.name: AgentArns
nested_items.description: The ARNs of the DataSync agents that can connect with your object storage system.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the location was created.

nested_items.name: ServerCertificate
nested_items.description: The certificate chain for DataSync to authenticate with your object storage system if the system uses a private or self-signed certificate authority (CA).
